moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of leaving the target paralyzed.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: I’m All Kinds of Strong!
moves.effect: Restores a bit of the user’s HP. Sharply raises the user’s Defense.

syncMove.name: Supercute Rolling Tackle
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is paralyzed.

passives.name: Mad Strength 2
passives.description: Has a moderate chance of raising the Pokémon’s Attack when one of its attacks is successful.
